mapper.sql: USERID, USERNAME, TRUENAME, PASSWORD, PHONE, ANUMBER, APASSWORD, ROLE, STATUS, LOGINDATE, REGISTERDATE,balance
mapper.insert: insert into LOTTERY.T_USER (USERID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, PHONE, ANUMBER, APASSWORD, balance ROLE, STATUS, TRUENAME, LOGINDATE, REGISTERDATE) values (seq_t_user.nextval, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apassword,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{role,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,sysdate)

USERID,
USERNAME,

balance,

ROLE, STATUS, LOGINDATE, REGISTERDATE, BALANCE

mapper.update:
update LOTTERY.T_USER
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRUENAME = #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANUMBER = #{anumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APASSWORD = #{apassword,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROLE = #{role,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOGINDATE = #{logindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REGISTERDATE = #{registerdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update LOTTERY.T_USER set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRUENAME = #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANUMBER = #{anumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APASSWORD = #{apassword,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ROLE = #{role,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOGINDATE = #{logindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REGISTERDATE = #{registerdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_user where anumber = #{anumber}
mapper.update: update t_user set logindate = sysdate where userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select * from t_user where round(to_number(sysdate-registerdate)*24*60)>2 and registerdate = logindate and status = 0 and role = 0
mapper.update: update t_user set status = 0, logindate = sysdate where userid = #{userid} and status = 1
